translation.text: https://transportnsw.info/alerts#/train
Station Update - Sydenham

A new Metro concourse is being constructed on the northern end of Sydenham Station. 
While the concourse is being installed, please use the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5. 
If you need help, please ask staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info
https://transportnsw.info/alerts#/train
Station Update - Central

There are changes happening at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works. Access to certain areas of the station and platforms may mean using different stairs, escalators and lifts. Please follow the signs and staff directions. If you need assistance, see station staff. For detailed information please visit https://transportnsw.info/alerts/details#/6063489
https://www.transportnsw.info/alerts#/6050456
Hawkesbury Rd bus stop closures and diversions

From 8pm Friday 5 June, Hawkesbury Rd, Westmead will be one-way in a southbound direction between Darcy Rd and Hainsworth St. The following stops will be permanently closed:

∙ The Westmead Institute Hawkesbury Rd (214516)
∙ Westmead Hospital Hawkesbury Rd (214517)

The alternative stops are Westmead Children's Hospital Hawkesbury Rd (214515) or Darcy Rd after Hawkesbury Rd (214518).

From 8pm Friday 5 June, Hawkesbury Rd, Westmead will be one-way in a southbound direction between Darcy Rd and Hainsworth St. The following stops will be permanently closed:
  • The Westmead Institute Hawkesbury Rd (214516)
  • Westmead Hospital Hawkesbury Rd (214517)
The alternative stops are Westmead Children’s Hospital Hawkesbury Rd (214515) or Darcy Rd after Hawkesbury Rd (214518).
https://www.transportnsw.info/alerts#/6051796
Roseville Station Commuter Car Park temporary closure
From Monday 3 August 2020 the Roseville Station Commuter Car Park will be closed for approximately 16 months while station upgrades take place.

Victoria Rd, Rozelle bus stop relocation
From Saturday 29 February, the city-bound bus stop on Victoria Rd opposite Hornsey St (203916) will be relocated to just after Loughlin St until the completion of the Rozelle Interchange in 2023.
From Saturday 29 February, the city-bound bus stop on Victoria Rd opposite Hornsey St (203916) will be relocated to just after Loughlin St until the completion of the Rozelle Interchange in 2023.

Crows Nest, temporary bus stop closure

From 4am Monday 11 January 2021 to the end of August 2023, Sydney Metro works will see bus stop Pacific Hwy after Oxley St (206515) close. 

The alternative stop will be Pacific Hwy after Albany St (206514) affecting routes 114, 144, 252, 254, 257, 265, 286, 287, 290, 291 and 320 heading towards the North Sydney, McMahons Point, the Northern Beaches, the city and Mascot.

From 4am Monday 11 January 2021 to the end of August 2023, Sydney Metro works will see bus stop Pacific Hwy after Oxley St (206515) close.

The alternative stop will be Pacific Hwy after Albany St (206514) affecting routes 114, 144, 252, 254, 257, 265, 286, 287, 290, 291 and 320 heading towards the North Sydney, McMahons Point, the Northern Beaches, the city and Mascot.

Hamlyn Terrace bus diversions

From Monday 12 April until Friday 24 September, route 79 buses will divert and miss two bus stops while roadworks take place. 

Closed stops

∙ Louisiana Rd at Gleeson Pde (2259267)
∙ Louisiana Rd opp Gleeson Pde (2259264)

Temporary changes to overnight light rail services between Central and The Star

As a result of the latest directives from the Australian Government around public gatherings, the L1 Dulwich Hill overnight light rail services operating from 11pm (midnight on Friday) to 6am between Central Grand Concourse and The Star are suspended in both directions.

These temporary service changes are in place until further notice.

Use Trip Planner for alternative transport.

As a result of the latest directives from the Australian Government around public gatherings, the L1 Dulwich Hill overnight light rail services operating from 11pm (midnight on Friday) to 6am between Central Grand Concourse and The Star are suspended in both directions.

These temporary service changes are in place until further notice.

Use Trip Planner for alternative transport.

Station Update - Tempe

The stairs from Richardsons Crescent to concourse are closed for maintenance work until November 2021. Access to platforms 2 and 3 is via platform 1 side entrance (off carpark on Richardsons Crescent). Entrance from Griffiths St is not affected.
https://transportnsw.info/alerts#/train
Station Update - Canterbury, Dulwich Hill, Hurlstone Park and more
Due to Metro construction works, platforms have a reduced capacity. Please avoid standing in front of the construction zones and remain behind the yellow line on the platforms.
https://www.transportnsw.info/alerts#/6061164
Mascot Station, temporary bus stop closures

From 9pm Friday 9 May to 5am Sunday 5 November 2021, work at Mascot will result in the following closures: 

∙ Bus stop Mascot Station, Bourke St Stand C (202084) will be closed. The alternative stop will be Bourke St after Church St (202051) for the 357 towards Bondi Junction.
∙ Bus stop Mascot Station, Bourke St, Stand D (202085) will be closed. The alternative stop will be Bourke St before Church St (202054) for the 305 heading towards Mascot Stamford Hotel, the 307 towards Port Botany and the 418 towards Burwood.

From 9pm Friday 9 May to 5am Sunday 5 November 2021, work at Mascot will result in the following closures: 
  • Bus stop Mascot Station, Bourke St Stand C (202084) will be closed. The alternative stop will be Bourke St after Church St (202051) for the 357 towards Bondi Junction.
  • Bus stop Mascot Station, Bourke St, Stand D (202085) will be closed. The alternative stop will be Bourke St before Church St (202054) for the 305 heading towards Mascot Stamford Hotel, the 307 towards Port Botany and the 418 towards Burwood.

Station Update - Wynyard

Until November 2021, the escalators to Exit 1 (Wynyard Park) will undergo upgrade works. Please follow the signs and staff directions to the nearest available stairs or lift. If you need assistance, see station staff or call 9224 2959.

Station Update - St Marys
Commuter parking has been reduced at St Marys Station. For more information please see signage around the station or visit www.transport.nsw.gov.au/stmarys

Station Update - Warwick Farm

Floss St, Canterbury, temporary bus stop relocation

From 4am Monday 12 July to 4am Tuesday 30 November 2021, Sydney Metro work will result in the temporary relocation of bus stop Floss St opp Hurlstone Park Station (219312). The bus stop will be relocated to new bus stop Crinan St at Floss St (2193115). The 406 towards Hurlstone Park and the N40 towards Town Hall will be affected.

From 4am Monday 12 July to 4am Tuesday 30 November 2021, Sydney Metro work will result in the temporary relocation of bus stop Floss St opp Hurlstone Park Station (219312). The bus stop will be relocated to new bus stop Crinan St at Floss St (2193115). The 406 towards Hurlstone Park and the N40 towards Town Hall will be affected.

Herring Rd, temporary bus stop closure

From 4am Monday 19 July to 4am Monday 31 January 2022, as part of the Macquarie Park Bus Priority and Capacity Improvements project, bus stop Macquarie University Station, Herring Rd, Stand E (211343) will be closed to facilitate construction work. 

The alternative stop will be Dunmore Lang College, Herring Rd (211342).

From 4am Monday 19 July to 4am Monday 31 January 2022, as part of the Macquarie Park Bus Priority and Capacity Improvements project, bus stop Macquarie University Station, Herring Rd, Stand E (211343) will be closed to facilitate construction work.

The alternative stop will be Dunmore Lang College, Herring Rd (211342).

The Crescent, Annandale temporary bus stop closure

The westbound bus stop on The Crescent at Johnston St (203816) will be closed from Monday 16 November 2020 until January 2023 for WestConnex Rozelle Interchange works.

Route 433 services towards Balmain Gladstone Park and Major Event Bus route 2 towards Sydney Olympic Park will use the stop on The Crescent at View St (203815) instead.

Check signs for directions to the alternative stop location.

The westbound bus stop on The Crescent at Johnston St (203816) will be closed from Monday 16 November 2020 until January 2023 for WestConnex Rozelle Interchange works.

Route 433 services towards Balmain Gladstone Park and Major Event Bus route 2 towards Sydney Olympic Park will use the stop on The Crescent at View St (203815) instead.

Check signs for directions to the alternative stop location.

Juniors Kingsford Interchange and bus roadway temporary bus stop closures

From 9pm Friday 9 to 5am Monday 9 August 2021, the partial closure of the L2 and L3 lines will mean buses cannot access the Moore Park roadway and the Juniors Kingsford interchange. 

The following closures will be in place:

Moore Park Roadway
-Services towards the City

∙ Moore Park Busway at Lang Rd (202144) will be closed. The alternative stop is Anzac Pde before Cleveland St (202112) affecting routes 373, 374, 376 and 377.
∙ Moore Park Busway at Robertson Rd (202138) will be closed. The alternative stop is Anzac Pde opp Robertson Rd (202111) affecting routes 373, 374, 376 and 377.
∙ Moore Park Busway after Alison Rd (203348) will be closed. The alternative stop is Alison Rd before Doncaster Ave (203143) affecting routes 373, 374, 376 and 377.

-Services away from the City

∙ Moore Park Busway after Lang Rd (202143) will be closed. The alternative stop is Anzac Pde after Lang Rd (202128) affecting routes 373, 374, 376 and 377.
∙ Moore Park Busway at Robertson Rd (202145) will be closed. The alternative stop is Anzac Pde before Robertson Rd (202129) affecting routes 373, 374, 376 and 377.
∙ Moore Park Busway before Alison Rd (202146) will be closed. The alternative stop is Alison Rd opp Doncaster Ave (203337) affecting routes 373, 374, 376 and 377.

Juniors Kingsford Interchange

∙ Juniors Kingsford Stand A (203290) will be closed. The alternative stop is Anzac Pde at Hayward St (203254) for the 400 towards Sydney Airport via Eastgardens and 400N towards Eastgardens.
∙ Juniors Kingsford Stand B (203292) will be closed. The alternative stop is Anzac Pde at Wallace St (203245) for the 400 and 400N towards Bondi Junction.

From 9pm Friday 9 to 5am Monday 9 August 2021, the partial closure of the L2 and L3 lines will mean buses cannot access the Moore Park roadway and the Juniors Kingsford interchange.

The following closures will be in place:

Moore Park Roadway
-Services towards the City
  • Moore Park Busway at Lang Rd (202144) will be closed. The alternative stop is Anzac Pde before Cleveland St (202112) affecting routes 373, 374, 376 and 377.
  • Moore Park Busway at Robertson Rd (202138) will be closed. The alternative stop is Anzac Pde opp Robertson Rd (202111) affecting routes 373, 374, 376 and 377.
  • Moore Park Busway after Alison Rd (203348) will be closed. The alternative stop is Alison Rd before Doncaster Ave (203143) affecting routes 373, 374, 376 and 377.
-Services away from the City
  • Moore Park Busway after Lang Rd (202143) will be closed. The alternative stop is Anzac Pde after Lang Rd (202128) affecting routes 373, 374, 376 and 377.
  • Moore Park Busway at Robertson Rd (202145) will be closed. The alternative stop is Anzac Pde before Robertson Rd (202129) affecting routes 373, 374, 376 and 377.
  • Moore Park Busway before Alison Rd (202146) will be closed. The alternative stop is Alison Rd opp Doncaster Ave (203337) affecting routes 373, 374, 376 and 377.
Juniors Kingsford Interchange
  • Juniors Kingsford Stand A (203290) will be closed. The alternative stop is Anzac Pde at Hayward St (203254) for the 400 towards Sydney Airport via Eastgardens and 400N towards Eastgardens.
  • Juniors Kingsford Stand B (203292) will be closed. The alternative stop is Anzac Pde at Wallace St (203245) for the 400 and 400N towards Bondi Junction.

Melbourne to Sydney XPT alteration.

Due to border closure the Melbourne to Sydney XPT services will commence at Albury. No travel service will be provided between Melbourne and Albury.


Use the Trip Planner for the latest travel information with real time updates.

T1 North Shore Line: Trackwork between Hornsby and Central

Monday 2 to Thursday 5 August

∙ Nightly from 9.50pm until 2am, buses replace trains between Hornsby and Central.
∙ Trains run to the normal timetable between Berowra and Hornsby.
∙ T1 Western and T9 Northern Line trains start and end at Central, platforms 1-12.
∙ Plan your trip before you travel for up-to-date information.

Bus routes
12T1: Chatswood, then all stations to Central and return
15T1: Chatswood, then Artarmon, St Leonards, North Sydney, Wynyard, Town Hall, Central and return
16T1: Hornsby, then all stations to Chatswood, then Wynyard, Town Hall, Central and return

Monday 2 to Thursday 5 August

  • Nightly from 9.50pm until 2am, buses replace trains between Hornsby and Central.
  • Trains run to the normal timetable between Berowra and Hornsby.
  • T1 Western and T9 Northern Line trains start and end at Central, platforms 1-12.
  • Plan your trip before you travel for up-to-date information.
Bus routes
12T1: Chatswood, then all stations to Central and return
15T1: Chatswood, then Artarmon, St Leonards, North Sydney, Wynyard, Town Hall, Central and return
16T1: Hornsby, then all stations to Chatswood, then Wynyard, Town Hall, Central and return

Trackwork between Cabramatta and Bankstown, and between Lidcombe and Sydenham via Bankstown

Saturday 7 and Sunday 8 August

∙ Buses replace trains between Cabramatta and Bankstown, and between Lidcombe and Sydenham via Bankstown.
∙ Some early morning buses extend to Liverpool.
∙ Trains run to a changed timetable between Leppington and the City via Regents Park, stopping all-stations between Cabramatta and Lidcombe.
∙ Trains also run between Sydenham, St Peters, Erskineville and the City Circle, to a changed timetable.
∙ Plan your trip before you travel for up-to-date information.

Bus routes

13T3: Campsie, Canterbury then Sydenham and return
14T3: Cabramatta, then all stations to Bankstown and return
33T3: Bankstown, then all stations to Belmore then Sydenham and return
34T3: Lidcombe express to Bankstown, then all stations to Sydenham and return

Trackwork between Cabramatta and Granville

Saturday 7 and Sunday 8 August

∙ Buses replace trains between Cabramatta and Granville.
∙ Trains run to a changed timetable between Richmond or Schofields and Olympic Park. Some late night and early morning trains run between Richmond and Central, platforms 1-12.
∙ T2 Inner West & Leppington Line trains run to a changed timetable between Leppington and the City via Regents Park.
∙ You may need to change trains at Lidcombe to continue your journey.
∙ Plan your trip before you travel for up-to-date information.

Bus routes
4T2: Cabramatta, then all stations to Granville and return
5T2: Cabramatta, then Canley Vale, Fairfield, Granville and return
14T2: Merrylands, then Granville and return

Saturday 7 and Sunday 8 August

  • Buses replace trains between Cabramatta and Granville.

The Star temporary stop closure

From 6am Wednesday 21 July until further notice, L1 Dulwich Hill Line light rail services will not stop at The Star while the whole casino complex is closed under NSW Government COVID-19 guidelines. 

No other stops are affected. 

Please use the alternative nearest stops: Pyrmont Bay or John Street Square (approx. 5 minute walk). 

All Sydney Light Rail services continue to run at current reduced frequencies. L1 line night services from 11pm to 6am continue to be suspended between Central and The Star. 

Please allow extra travel time and use the Trip Planner or check travel alerts to see if your travel is affected.
